name: Survive The Night (Toby Melvin)
description:
Survive the Night is a Zombie survival game.

Seize the day! Survive the night...

Loot areas and craft weapons in order defend yourself from the undead and escape the forgotten town. 

Complete objectives in order to escape
Loot , scavenge and kill zombies for resources
Craft items and weapons
Zombies hunt you down at Night
Zombies increase in strength as each day passes.
